About Us

We are a team of music enthusiasts who are passionate about vinyl records. We believe that there is something special about the experience of listening to music on a record player that cannot be replicated by digital formats. Our goal is to share our love of vinyl with others and provide a platform where people can discover new music, connect with other collectors, and learn more about the history and culture surrounding vinyl records.


Meet the Team

Dom

Founder and CEO

Joe

Head of Marketing

Larry

Head of Design


Our Mission

At Vinyl Visions, our mission is to create a space where music lovers can come together to share their passion for vinyl. We believe that music is more than just a commodity to be consumed - it's an experience that should be savored and enjoyed.

Whether you're a seasoned collector or a newcomer to the world of vinyl, we invite you to join us on this journey. Let's celebrate the beauty of music together.
